item.title: Dan Werthimer radio interview
item.description: Here's a one hour radio interview featuring Berkeley SETI Research Center's Dan Werthimer that aired on CBC radio last weekend. http://www.cbc.ca/1.3182903

item.title: Big boost for SETI@home from Yuri Milner's Breakthrough Listen Initiative
item.description: SETI@home and Berkeley SETI Research Center are proud to be participating in the new Breakthrough Listen initiative, that will dramatically expand the search for life beyond Earth. http://nyti.ms/1KfWuYF
